title: The Atari Hotel in Las Vegas Isn’t Happening Anymore
full_text: The Atari Hotel in Las Vegas Isn’t Happening Anymore. The company says the plans for Phoenix are still in play.. Back in January 2020, just before the start of the Covid-19 pandemic, Atari announced it would be building several hotels across the country. Six years later, none have been built. And the Las Vegas … [+2160 chars]
